name: InfluenzaTestsForInfluenzaAVirusByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Influenza (Tests for influenza A virus by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes for lab test names to detect Influenza A  in a culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Influenza A virus culture/isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
